ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] GZ answers some bard questions
ygData.msgSnippet: Don t put words in my mouth.  I did not say that I was thrilled with summon food and water.  I was merely saying that it DID have a use, especially in the
ygData.messageBody:
Don't put words in my mouth. I did not say that I was "thrilled" with
summon food and water. I was merely saying that it DID have a use,
especially in the light of our being a utility class. Of COURSE I'd rather
have better effects on those items.

[51 Minstrel] Crier (Half Elf) <Seekers of Norrath> ZONE: work

> --- JasonF <jasonf@...> wrote:
>
> >Also, the
> > food and drink that you summon can be given to your
> > group as well. This
> > means that not only you, but your party members
> > don't have to want for food
> > and drink either.
>
> But to work thru 50 odd lvls to have the same ability
> as a 1st lvl magician seems a bit anticlimatic, to say
> the least.
>
> Glad you are thrilled with this new ability...I'd be
> much happier to see us able to summon, say Beer
> braised Lion that doesn't evaporate when we log tho
> ... then I'd be happier. But that's just me.
>
> Tyunes of Rodcet Nife
